Title: 37309 - # Features of a Successful Startup
Direction: 675 words: List 4-8 features of a successful startup. These can include choosing a niche product or service for your startup, marketing skills, accounting/bookkeeping tools, etc. You can include the client link in the section about accounting and bookkeeping. Your audience consists of business people and entrepreneurs.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: essential cloud accounting software from Sage

Title: 37310 - # Reasons Why Your Small Business Should Use the Cloud
Direction: 675 words: List 4-8 reasons why a small business should use cloud based services. These reasons could include lower costs, better integration, better security, disaster recovery, etc. Include a section on cloud based tools a small business could use so you can include the client link. Your audience consists of small business owners and entrepreneurs.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: cloud accounting services from Sage

Title: 37319 - # Tech Tools Your Small Business Needs
Direction: 675 words: List 4-8 tech tools that are beneficial to a small business. These can include project management, organizational, and accounting/bookkeeping tools. You can include the client link in the section on accounting/bookkeeping tools. Be sure not to mention any competitors of Sage though.  Your audience consists of business owners interested in technology.
